'''Clifford Ndugu''' is the father of [[Winston Ndugu]].

==History==
===Wife's Cancer===
When his wife was diagnosed with cancer, he started drinking more and ended up in jail multiple times. His wife then used the money that was meant to be for her treatment to bail him out on more than one occasion, which created a rift between him and his son, Winston. ''("[[Road Trippin']]")''

===Antoinette's Birthday===
Years later, Clifford and Winston were still estranged. Clifford doesn't think well of Winston, reminding his mother and Maggie that he almost failed sixth grade. Winston defended that he did that because he was busy helping his mother while Clifford gambled away all their money. When he joined the Zoom call on his mother's birthday, he told Winston they should try to keep the peace. Winston said he was right and then quickly left the call. ''("[[You'll Never Walk Alone]]")''

==Relationships==
===Familial===
He is estranged from his son, Winston, but is close with his mother and his other son, Wendell.

==Notes and Trivia==
*He has a problem with gambling.
*He also has a drinking problem, which led to him being jailed more than once.<ref>[[Road Trippin']], 18x14</ref>
